sentences.english: Shenzhen, the Chinese People’s Liberation Army’s naval destroyer, entered Tokyo Bay.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民解放軍的深圳號驅逐艦進入了東京港。

sentences.english: Three Rules of Discipline Eight Points for Attention is the People's Liberation Army regulations.
sentences.chinese: 三大紀律八項注意是中國人民解放軍的法規。

sentences.english: It is truly a people's army.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民解放軍是真正的人民軍隊。

sentences.english: The 2nd Artillery Corps of the People's Liberation Army controls China's land-based missile forces.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民解放軍第二炮兵控制着中國的陸基導彈力量。

sentences.english: During the trip, Gates will visit the PLA's 2nd Artillery Corps, according to the China News Service.
sentences.chinese: 期間，蓋茨將參觀中國人民解放軍第二炮兵司令部。

sentences.english: August the first is the Army Day of the Chinese People 's Liberation Army .
sentences.chinese: 八月一日是中國人民解放軍的建軍節。

sentences.english: People's Liberation Army Foreign Language School in Luoyang outstanding deputy secretary of the CYL organizations.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民解放軍洛陽外國語學院優秀團組織副書記。

sentences.english: Is the predecessor of the PLA General Armament Department.
sentences.chinese: 前身是中國人民解放軍總裝備部。

sentences.english: The garrison belongs to a unit of the People's Liberation Army stationed in the downtown area of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 駐軍屬中國人民解放軍駐重慶城區的一個連隊。

sentences.english: The People’s Liberation Army has recently relaxed the rules for enlistment in a drive to improve the Chinese military’s recruiting numbers.
sentences.chinese: 增加徵兵數量，中國人民解放軍最近放寬了入伍規則。

sentences.english: Zhude is one of the main leaders and founders of PLA.
sentences.chinese: 朱德是中國人民解放軍的主要創建人和領導人之一。

sentences.english: Original Chinese People's Liberation Army 411 hospital infection branch director.
sentences.chinese: 原中國人民解放軍411醫院傳染科主任。

definition: War of Liberation (1945-49), after which the Communists 共產黨武裝|共产党武装 under Mao Zedong 毛澤東|毛泽东 took over from the Nationalists 國民政府|国民政府 under Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
